title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when selecting SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: When I select SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, it emits a beep sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not emit a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE.
4. Click on Styles SWT.MULTI.
